org.apache.ki.grails
Class RealmAdapter

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.ki.grails.RealmAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.ki.authz.Authorizer, org.apache.ki.realm.Realm
public abstract class RealmAdapter
extends Object
implements org.apache.ki.realm.Realm

Adapter for the RealmWrapper which has problems implementing the "String..." methods under JDK 1.5. So, these methods automatically convert the strings into WildcardPermission instances.
